attributes.action: MPs on a Public Sector Pension
attributes.additional_details:
All of us in UK plc live in changing and difficult economic times.

We ALL need to be prepared to make adjustments.

Members of Parliament should change their pension scheme in a manner compatible with that currently proposed for parts of the public sector.

If "We" are all genuinely in this together, Members of Parliament need to lead by example.

This would be fair, and Members of Parliament would undoubtedly earn respect.
